div.h2: Preparing students academically and socially to be problem solvers and productive citizens.

img.alt: This is the image for the news article titled Tech Expansion Critical to DeSoto ISD’s Future in Remote Learning Initiative

a.title: Tech Expansion Critical to DeSoto ISD’s Future in Remote Learning Initiative

div.a: Tech Expansion Critical to DeSoto ISD’s Future in Remote Learning Initiative
div.div: As the district developed its plan to provide a continuation of learning and instruction, leaders also understood the importance of helping to close the digital divide for students and families.
div.a: Read More about Tech Expansion Critical to DeSoto ISD’s Future in Remote Learning Initiative

img.alt: This is the image for the news article titled DeSoto ISD to Remain Closed for Remainder of 2019-2020 Academic Year

a.title: DeSoto ISD to Remain Closed for Remainder of 2019-2020 Academic Year

div.a: DeSoto ISD to Remain Closed for Remainder of 2019-2020 Academic Year
div.div: All DeSoto Independent School District campuses will remain closed through the end of the current academic school year. This action follows today’s April 17, 2020, press conference from Texas Governor Greg Abbott.
div.a: Read More about DeSoto ISD to Remain Closed for Remainder of 2019-2020 Academic Year
